categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Unidentified Sith Pureblood female Sith apprentice

This Unidentified Sith Pureblood female was selected as the Sith apprentice to the Falleen Sith Lord Darth Karrid during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY, she and her Master perished in the Battle of Duro.
